snippet: Law enforcement efforts should not interfere with the right of anyone, including sex workers, to protect their health.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Megan McLemore, a senior researcher at Human Rights Watch, warns that police in several US cities regularly harass sex workers for carrying large numbers of condoms, using them as evidence to support arrests; contends that trend is causing some sex workers to engage in risky behavior, undoing the progress of condom-distribution programs and potentially increasing the spread of HIV.
lead_paragraph: Law enforcement efforts should not interfere with the right of anyone, including sex workers, to protect their health.
